scripts.build: cd client && npm ci && npm run build && cd ../server && npm ci
scripts.db:reset: cd server && node -e "import('./db.js').then(async m => { await m.pool.query('TRUNCATE TABLE uploaded_beneficiaries, users RESTART IDENTITY CASCADE'); console.log('Database tables cleared'); process.exit(0); })"
scripts.db:clear-beneficiaries: cd server && node -e "import('./db.js').then(async m => { await m.pool.query('TRUNCATE TABLE uploaded_beneficiaries RESTART IDENTITY'); console.log('Beneficiaries table cleared'); process.exit(0); })"
scripts.db:status: cd server && node -e "import('./db.js').then(async m => { const users = await m.pool.query('SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users'); const beneficiaries = await m.pool.query('SELECT COUNT(*) FROM uploaded_beneficiaries'); console.log('Users:', users.rows[0].count, 'Beneficiaries:', beneficiaries.rows[0].count); process.exit(0); })"
scripts.clean: concurrently "cd client && rm -rf dist node_modules" "cd server && rm -rf node_modules"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.render-build: cd client && npm ci && npm rebuild --platform=linux && npm run build
scripts.railway-build: cd client && npm ci && npm run build
